name: War Bonds
desc: During boss events, 5 missiles bombard the area, dealing 2.5% (+2.5 per stack) of bosses ' Max Health in damage . Before the boss event, gain additional missiles, up to a maximum of 20 (+5 per stack) , per 50 gold gained. Gold requirement scales with time .
notes:
War Bonds is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
At the start of every Teleporter event and boss fight, this item strikes bosses with 5 missiles that each deal 2.5% of the boss's maximum health as damage (+2.5% per stack). For every 50 gold gained before the boss fight (scales with time), up to 20 additional missiles (+5 per stack) can be fired. 
This item also activates on any Scavengers that spawn in or find an item.


== Notes ==
The missiles from War Bonds have a proc coefficient of 0 .
 Pocket I.C.B.M. will spawn 2 more missiles, but only with half the damage of the original.
If War Bonds is not targeting a boss, its missiles will instead deal 3200% damage each, regardless of the target's maximum health.
If the targeted boss dies while War Bonds still has missiles left, the UES Safe Travels inexplicably launches the missiles at you instead, damaging you if Artifact of Chaos is enabled.
4 stacks of an item and 33 successfully landed missiles are required to entirely take out single phase of   final boss,   Voidling or   False Son.
